trivia
Class ToggleButton

java.lang.Object
  trivia.Button
      trivia.ToggleButton

public class ToggleButton
extends Button

A button that has two states, on and off. Clicking the button flips the state.

Author:
Cody Swendrowski, Dan Miller

public boolean isClicked()
Description copied from class: Button
Returns true if Button was clicked; else, returns false. If it is true, it sets it to false immediately. One-use method.
